lines.name: Boss
lines.text: Glad to see you've infiltrated enemy lines Agent

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: Time for you to recieve your whole assignment:

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: Go through the club, assassinate the 2 targets, and leave no witnesses

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: When the music starts, move to the beat as best as you can to avoid detection

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: I'm sure you know by now, but stay out of the red line of sight cones unless you're behind cover

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: If you are somehow spotted, make sure the threat is neutralized before it endangers the mission

lines.name: Boss
lines.text: You can attack enemies by running into them on a beat when they don't move
